short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A streamlined set of tools for SEO and web development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Developer Toolbox is a powerful and intuitive browser extension designed to simplify SEO and web development workflows. Packed with essential features, it provides developers and SEO professionals with a quick way to analyze, optimize, and manage web pages directly in their browser.

Features:
- Highlight nofollow and dofollow links for link profile analysis.
- Toggle visual highlights for headers, paragraphs, and lists.
- Copy entire webpage content in a single click.
- View meta tags like page title and descriptions effortlessly.
- Check for canonical tags to avoid duplicate content issues.
- Count internal and external links on a page for link-building insights.
- Detect and highlight broken links quickly to improve website health.
- Clear cache and reload pages to ensure you see the latest changes.

Whether you're an SEO specialist, web developer, or digital marketer, this extension saves time and enhances productivity. By making it easier to spot issues and analyze on-page elements, it helps you deliver better results.

Install the SEO Developer Toolbox today and streamline your web analysis like never before!
